file.title: Id program

p.text: For each your program is generated by its unique ID program . All registration keys are issued for a specific ID program . If you change it, then the previously issued keys (on the old ID) is not suitable for a new ID. Also, the same shall remain encryption key .

remarks.text: If you use two objects Trial - for example, one to enter the activation key, the other for the generation of these keys (as in the example Examples \ Complex projects \ Trial ), then make sure that Id program and encryption key they were same !
